summary: Increases damage of every arrow in the game by 2.5x
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hmcMJ.png[/IMG][/center]
[color=009944]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     [b]INTRODUCTION[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color]
This is a small mod that increases the damage of every arrow in the game. I felt that taking an arrow to the face should have a better chance of killing someone. I wanted enemy archers in the game to be more of a threat instead of just a nuisance. It aims to not over-power archery, so it does not alter the damage of bows. Currently, it simply gives a significant damage boost to all arrows (except darts from traps) while maintaining, and improving, the balance.

[Center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VzSvZ.png[/IMG][/center]
[color=009944]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [b]VERSION HISTORY[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color]
Version 2.1 - Update - [color=red]Current[/color]
[list][*]Completely new esp files for each version. Hopefully this will fix the issue with it unticking in NMM.
[*]Added new Lite version (Damage increase 1.5x that of vanilla)
[/list]

Version 2.0 - Initial Release
[list][*]All arrow damage increased by 2.5x[/list]
[color=009944]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
HOW TO INSTALL
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color]
Download ONE of the available versions. Each download contains everything needed.(I recommend using Nexus Mod Manager, as it is really awesome and easy.)

NMM INSTALLATION----------------------------------------------------------
1. Click [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hv1dx.png[/IMG]
2. Once download finishes, double click the mod and NMM will do the rest.
2. Play the game.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MANUAL INSTALLATION------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Choose a version to download and download it using the manual option. 
2. Extract the contents of the file into the Data/ folder found in your Skyrim installation directory.
3. Activate the ESP file in the DATA FILES option in the Skyrim Launcher. Play the game.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=009944]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    [b] NOTES/CREDITS[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color]
Twitter page in the making so you can follow and get updates if you want!
If you like this mod: support it, share it, endorse it! Thanks!
An extra special thanks to [color=cc6633]MY WIFE, MAYLEE[/color] for putting up with my shit and the long hours spent making this mod. I married the coolest chick ever, who is a gamer herself (she loves Skyrim) and she\'s my go-to person for inspiration and criticism. :P

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iFAEb.png[/IMG][/center]
